Package index

All functions

auto_LitFetchR_setup()
Automating the retrieval of references based on a saved search string(s).
create_save_search()
Create and save search string(s).
dedup_refs()
deduplicate the references from three dataframes
manual_fetch()
manual literature fetch
remove_scheduled_task()
Remove a scheduled task by name from Task Scheduler (Windows) or Cron (Mac/Linux)
save_api_keys()
Save Web of Science and/or Scopus API keys in .Renviron
